banner.title: Essential oils in the fight against bacteria
banner.description: Thyme and rosemary under the magnifying glass of P.U.M.A. scientists. Discover how natural oils can enhance the effects of antibiotics and be a weapon in an era of bacterial resistance.

banner2.title: Between science and practice, or how P.U.M.A. works.
banner2.description: The P.U.M.A. laboratory combines basic research with practical application. Learn more about our work in the UMW University Newspaper - Year 2025 September/October on pages 9 to 11.

banner3.title: MMS - a mineral panacea in alternative medicine
banner3.description: Does MMS actually cure? P.U.M.A. scientists have proven that concentrations that inhibit bacteria simultaneously destroy the body's cells. The results in "Scientific Reports".
